about_the_game:
Waking up in pitch darkness, surrounded by the rustling of leaves and strange sounds. The forest breathes life, but this life is hostile. Strange creatures, looking like nightmares from your worst dreams, are ready to tear you apart in a moment. You are alone, unarmed, unprotected, lost in this terrible forest. You need to find a weapon and fight back the enemies. Collect the necessary resources for survival and get out of here.

LOST TIMES is a mix of Roguelike and RPG, where you will have to go through survival tests. You will wander along dark paths, fight enemies, collect resources, look for shelter and try to unravel the mystery of your appearance in this terrible place.

Features of the game:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies
- Pleasant soundtrack

name: LOST TIMES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (21866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
